sentences.sContent: You can bet that would truly paralyze the flow of credit: Does anyone believe Washington can manage banks?
sentences.sContent_eng: You can bet that would truly paralyze the flow of credit: Does anyone believe Washington can manage banks?
sentences.sCn: 你可以打赌，这会使流动的信贷真正限于瘫痪：真有人相信华盛顿可以经营银行吗？

remMethod.val: para(一边) ＋ lyz(松开) + e → 身体的一边松了 → 使瘫痪

words.tran: 使麻痹；使无力；使失去勇气（paralyze的过去分词）
